thread.title: Yvonne Peil
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Yvonne Peil

author: Yvonne Peil
title: Yvonne Peil
text: After doing quit a bit of research on Dents gloves I decided they were for me. Dents was out of stock on the style that I wanted. Next I had to find finding a retailer to make my purchase from. The style of gloves that I wanted was not available in the USA. As anyone would be, I was a little hesitant to make my purchase from any where out of the USA, after several hours of searching I came across Country Attire Ltd. They made the purchase so easy and kept me up to date on the purchasing and shipping of my order. I would use this company again.
